name: com.unity.cinemachine
description:
Smart camera tools for passionate creators. 

Cinemachine 3.0 is a newer and better version of Cinemachine, but upgrading an existing project from 2.X will likely require some effort.  If you're considering upgrading an older project, please see our upgrade guide in the user manual.

samples.description: Sample scenes illustrating various ways to use Cinemachine in a 2D setting
Sample scenes illustrating various ways to use Cinemachine in a 3D setting
Sample scenes illustrating various ways to use Cinemachine with the input system.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- Regresion fix: Sequencer inspector child camera popups were not being populated.
- Regresion fix: Manager Camera's child camera warning icons were not being updated correctly.
- Bugfix: CinemachineInputAxisController editor was missing foldout arrows on the Driven Axis items.
